body_content.explanation: someone who looks through rubbish to find things they can use or sell:
examples: Trash pickers scavenge at the city dump for items to resell.
The rumble of the garbage trucks fades and the trash pickers go home.

body_content.explanation: someone who goes around a public place picking up small pieces of rubbish from the ground:
examples: Organizers sent out a team of trash pickers to clean up the beach.
Local trash pickers collected 100 bags of trash in just one hour.

body_content.explanation: a device like a long stick with two parts on the end that can be opened and pressed together using a handle at the top of the stick, in order to pick up small pieces of rubbish from the ground, or a stick with a point on the end that can be used to do this:
examples: Use thick gloves and a trash picker.
I take a trash picker with me when I go on walks, so I can pick up trash on the way.
